name: Crooked Castle
description:
Welcome to the Crooked Castle! Brawl your way to the top of the tower as it crumbles its way down to you! 

WASD + Arrow keys to MOVE
J to attack
K to SUPER ATTACK
SPACE to DODGE

This is a submission for Ludum Dare's 49th Gamejam!
Programming by Mathemagician
3D + Animation by trmrddr
Concept Art + UI by Giraffalope
Music + FX by Jason
